listings.title: Wireless Mouse
listings.description: A comfortable wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

listings.title: Mechanical Keyboard
listings.description: A high-performance mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting.

listings.title: 27-inch Monitor
listings.description: A 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with vibrant colors and sharp images.

listings.title: USB-C Hub
listings.description: A multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader.

listings.title: Noise-Cancelling Headphones
listings.description: Over-ear noise-cancelling headphones with long battery life.
